title: read config oidc from vault
body:
### Describe the bug

i'm using quarkus 2.5.1 and when use below config to load oidc config from vault, get error
quarkus.oidc.auth-server-url=${oidc.auth-server-url}

But when i use space in the end of variable problem is fix
quarkus.oidc.auth-server-url=${oidc.auth-server-url: }

what's your idea?
